publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2097 Jamie Hepburn: Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day—That the Parliament welcomes the number of gala days and similar events taking place across Scotland this summer; notes that Condorrat and Westfield community councils in Cumbernauld were able to organise their first Gala Day since 2003 on Saturday 7 June 2008; welcomes the huge turnout of local people to this event, demonstrating the strong sense of civic pride that exists in the town of Cumbernauld, and looks forward to next year’s Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day being as great a success as this year’s event.

S3M-2097 Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day (lodged on 9 June 2008) Alasdair Allan*, Alex Neil*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-2097 Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day (lodged on 9 June 2008) Gil Paterson*

S3M-2097 Jamie Hepburn: Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day—That the Parliament welcomes the number of gala days and similar events taking place across Scotland this summer; notes that Condorrat and Westfield community councils in Cumbernauld were able to organise their first Gala Day since 2003 on Saturday 7 June 2008; welcomes the huge turnout of local people to this event, demonstrating the strong sense of civic pride that exists in the town of Cumbernauld, and looks forward to next year’s Condorrat and Westfield Gala Day being as great a success as this year’s event. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Alex Neil, Bob Doris, Christina McKelvie, Stuart McMillan, Kenneth Gibson, Jim Tolson, Bill Kidd, Aileen Campbell, Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson*
